forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The day unfolds gently over Downtown San Francisco, a canvas of sunlit harmonies stretching from the East Bay to the soft horizon. The air is clear, with temperatures whispering around the low sixties, inviting locals to step out and embrace the luminous warmth. A light breeze from the west carries the scent of the ocean, hinting at distances and dreams, while high above, the sky unfurls in shades of deep blue with just a few whimsical clouds flirting at its edges. 

As the afternoon approaches, the city maintains its charm; the renowned fog, often an unwelcome companion, seems to linger at the bay’s edge, preserving the sweeping views of the Golden Gate as more majestic than elusive. While the sun warms the streets, one might find joy in donning a light sweater, breathable yet cozy enough to counter the hint of evening’s coolness. With this tranquil weather inviting adventure, why not wander through Golden Gate Park, where the blossoms are beginning to tease their colors out, or perhaps stroll along the Embarcadero, feeling the pulse of the city against the backdrop of the bay? Each moment promises a little magic under the golden sun.
